snippet: Mr. Heymann’s biographies were admired for their comprehensiveness and criticized for their use of single sources to reconstruct historical events.
abstract: C David Heymann, literary biographer turned best-selling celebrity biographer, dies at age 67.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Heymann’s biographies were admired for their comprehensiveness and criticized for their use of single sources to reconstruct historical events.

headline.seo: C. David Heymann, Biographer of Rich and Famous, Dies at 67
headline.main: C. David Heymann, Biographer of the Rich and Famous, Dies at 67
headline.print_headline: C. David Heymann, Biographer of the Rich and Famous, Dies at 67
